Title: Agent Orchestration : Transforming Inputs and Results in Semantic Kernel
Author: Learn Microsoft AI
Description:

Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/in/rvinothrajendran/ github : https://github.com/rvinothrajendran Buy me a Coffee : https://buymeacoffee.com/vinothrajendran we explore how developers can work with strongly-typed input and output models in AI agent workflows. By defining structured input classes, you can pass complex data into orchestrations in a type-safe manner, making your code more robust and easier to maintain. Similarly, agents and orchestrations can return structured outputs using custom classes, allowing your application to process rich, meaningful resultsâ€”not just plain text. You'll learn: How to define and use strongly-typed input and output classes Where to apply InputTransform and ResultTransform for custom handling This approach unlocks a more modular, scalable, and reliable way to build AI agent systems.
